I was too caught up with the ideas of getting good grades and finding good jobs that I forgot to enjoy my life. Life isn’t always easy and isn’t supposed to be. So here are 100 things I want to do, not necessary “100 things to do before I die” cuz I don’t want to feel the obligation to do so. If I do try something in this list out, it has to be for the pure joy/experience that I want to have, not anything else.

Cheers :)

  1. See Northern lights
  2. Go to Griffith Observatory
  3. Live in another country for at least 3 months and learn their language
  4. See the volcano
  5. Camp on top of a mountain to see stars
  6. Go skiing
  7. Visit Japan
  8. Eat that freaking expensive Kobe beef
  9. Visit Great Salt Lake
  10. Scuba diving
  11. Scream out loud on top of a mountain
  12. Make someone laugh to tear
  13. Visit South Africa
  14. Sleep in the forest
  15. Experience Spring, Summer, and Winter in 1 day
  16. Mauna Kea stargazing
  17. Let go of a floating lantern
  18. Climb the Grand Canyon
  19. Do a traveling video, upload it on youtube and get 1 thousand views haha
  20. Volunteer at an orphan
  21. Donate blood
  22. Try kayaking
  23. Let someone know how much they mean to you
  24. Perform an act without wanting something in return
  25. Give a hug to everyone you see in a day
  26. Be a mentor to someone
  27. Fly in a hot air balloon
  28. Get a drink for a stranger
  29. Witness a solar eclipse
  30. Knit a scarf
  31. Bake a cake for someone special
  32. Fold 1000 origami cranes and give them to someone special
  33. See Cherry blossom in Japan
  34. Meet someone you can only dream of meeting
  35. Go to Korean sauna
  36. Go to a concert
  37. Donate to charity
  38. Visit a European country
  39. Run a marathon
  40. Ride a zip line ride
  41. Whale watching
  42. Visit Machu Picchu
  43. Go to a drive-in cinema
  44. Learn to play the piano
  45. Go ice skating
  46. To be continued …
